Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to payment of accidental death benefits for members who die while travelling to work
Summary: Provides for payment of accidental death benefits for members who die while travelling from their primary residence directly to their place of business, or to a different location where such member was assigned to perform his or her duties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to payment of accidental death benefits for members who die while travelling to work
